information: The company BERNHARD KRIESTEN GMBH, is a Service Provider, founded in 1974, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Nurseries, Raw materials for construction and public works, Structural work, and Finishing work industries. It is based in Meinerzhagen, Germany.
